general.name: bosstile-final-collated
general.description:
The combined list of targets from all chunks[*] after they have been passed through the tiling code. This file thus indicates which targets were assigned fibers and which targets did not due to fiber collisions. This file is not the same as a concatentation of the final-bossN files from each chunk, because sections of many chunks have been "retiled", or newer chunks have overlapped older chunks and assigned fibers to targets that were originally collided.
This file also contains the most up-to-date version of the target selection flags so that a uniform sample of LRGs can be easily drawn from the file.
[*] - As per the name of the file, this file only contains targets from boss2 through bossN. Boss1, the commissioning chunk, was superceded by boss11. Chunks with numbers above 100 are for special plates that do not necessarily target LRGs. The file bosstile-final-collated-boss2-boss32.fits is the parent target catalog for DR10 and DR11 LSS catalogs. bosstile-final-collated-boss2-boss38.fits is the parent catalog for DR12.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

THING_ID.name: THING_ID
THING_ID.description: A unique identifier for each target.
THING_ID.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

FINALN.name: FINALN
FINALN.description:
The chunk number N of the final-bossN file
    that this target came from (which can be different from the CHUNK field).
FINALN.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

FINALID.name: FINALID
FINALID.description:
The file index value from that final-bossN file.
    This and finalN constitute a unique identifier for each object in the
    collated file.
FINALID.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

ICOLLIDED.name: ICOLLIDED
ICOLLIDED.description:
1=did not receive fiber because in a
    collision group. 0 otherwise.
ICOLLIDED.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

COLL_GROUP_FINALID.name: COLL_GROUP_FINALID
COLL_GROUP_FINALID.description:
Becuase the link lists in
    the original final-bossN files are now broken, this contains the
    FINALID values of the members of the collision group sorted in order
    of distance from the collided galaxy. When the collision group has 11
    or more members, only information for the closest 10 are given.
COLL_GROUP_FINALID.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

COLL_GROUP_BOSSTARGET1.name: COLL_GROUP_BOSSTARGET1
COLL_GROUP_BOSSTARGET1.description:
The boss_target1
    bitmasks for each target in the list. THis is for quick reference as
    to whether a colliding target is a QSO, CMASS LRG, LOWZ LRG, etc.
COLL_GROUP_BOSSTARGET1.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

NASSIGNED.name: NASSIGNED
NASSIGNED.description:
The number of finalN files in which a target
    was assigned a fiber. This rarely happens and is rarely larger than 2
    in practice.
NASSIGNED.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

WHICHFINAL.name: WHICHFINAL
WHICHFINAL.description:
A bitmask noting which final-bossN files
    the target received a fiber in.
WHICHFINAL.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

BOSS_TARGET1_009.name: BOSS_TARGET1_009
BOSS_TARGET1_009.description:
A bitmask that is similar to
    the boss_target1 bitmask, but this bitmask uses the target
    selection aglorithm from the main009 bosstarget file, which is the
    final target selection algorithm of the galaxy part of the BOSS
    survey. To select a uniform sample of CMASS or LOWZ galaxies,
    select on this bitmask.
BOSS_TARGET1_009.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update
